## AlCabinet.delete() method

Deletes a property in the cabinet (and schedules synchronization)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
delete(property: string): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  property | <code>string</code> | The property to be deleted. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`

A reference to the cabinet instance, so that calls to it may be chained.
